translations.translation: And the people were also asked to assemble.
and the people were told: "Will you join the assembly?
And it was said to the people, “Have you (also) gathered?”
And it was said to the people: "Are you (too) going to assemble"
And it was said to the people: Will you gather together?
The people were asked, 'Will you assemble?
And it was said unto the people: Are ye (also) gathering?
and the people were told, "Will you also gather together,
And it was said unto the people: are ye going to assemble.
and the people were told: ‘Will you all gather?!’
And the people were told: "Are ye (now) assembled?-
And it was said to the people: "Are you (too) going to assemble?
and the people were asked: 'Will you gather
And it was said to the people, “Are you all gathered?
And it was said to the people, "Will you congregate
[26:39] And it was said to the people, ‘Will you assemble!’
(And it was said unto the people: Are ye (also) gathering?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَقِيلَ لِلنَّاسِ } أي: نودي عليهم في الطرق والسلك: { هَلْ أَنتُمْ مُّجْتَمِعُونَ } [الشعراء: 39] لموعد يوم معلوم؛ حتى تشاهدوا حال موسى وهارون وغلبة السحرة عليهما، وإبطال ما أتيا به من السحر

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ وقيلَ للناسِ هل أنتم مُجْتَمِعُون } أي: اجتمعوا
 وعبّر بالاستفهام حثّاً على الاجتماع
